headline: Princess Cruises Celebrates Prestigious Ospitalità Italiana Certification for Alfredo's Pizzeria Aboard Sun Princess and Star Princess
summary: From hand-stretched dough to time-honored Italian techniques perfected at sea, Princess Cruises proudly announces that Alfredo's Pizzeria aboard Sun Princess and Star Princess has been awarded the prestigious Ospitalità Italiana Certification, the highest global recognition for authentic Italian cuisine and hospitality.

content.title: Princess Cruises Celebrates Prestigious Ospitalità Italiana Certification for Alfredo's Pizzeria Aboard Sun Princess and Star Princess
content.summary: From hand-stretched dough to time-honored Italian techniques perfected at sea, Princess Cruises proudly announces that Alfredo's Pizzeria aboard Sun Princess and Star Princess has been awarded the prestigious Ospitalità Italiana Certification, the highest global recognition for authentic Italian cuisine and hospitality.
